q_ch: 对于编号为19的裁剪任务，分配裁剪物料，物料来源：Main Warehouse, 布料类别：Cotton Fabric，数量：30米。
q_en: For cutting task with ID=19, allocate cutting materials from the Main Warehouse, with the material type being Cotton Fabric and a quantity of 30 meters.
gt:
Sure thing! Here's the allocation summary for your cutting task:

| Task ID | Warehouse        | Material Type  | Quantity Allocated | Allocation Status |
|---------|------------------|----------------|--------------------|-------------------|
| 19      | Main Warehouse   | Cotton Fabric  | 30 meters          | Allocated ✅      |

The materials have been successfully allocated to your cutting task. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😄

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name "Main Warehouse"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE warehouse_id = '1' AND material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse_material ID for the specific warehouse and material

steps.sql: INSERT INTO cutting_material_allocation (warehouse_material_id, cutting_task_id, allocated_num, is_allocated) VALUES ('1', 19, 30, 1);
steps.description: Allocate 30 meters of "Cotton Fabric" to the cutting task with ID=19
